steps.name: Given  basket icon is visible on the navigation bar
When  initial_num=0 product added to the basket and user adds product(-s) with discount=yes with Number of products=1 and quantity of each of the products Product count=9 to the basket
And  on the nav bar, the Product count=9 is displayed next to the basket icon
When  user clicks on the basket icon
